name: refer_friend
attributes: # [doc = " ユーザーが友人 (friend) を紹介すると、"]
# [doc = " - referrer_data.points に bonus を加算  "]
# [doc = " - friend_data.points に bonus/2 を加算  "]
# [doc = " 署名チェックは user／friend ともに省略しています。"]
body: let now = ctx . accounts . clock . unix_timestamp ;
let r = & mut ctx . accounts . referrer_data ;
r . count = r . count . checked_add (1) . unwrap () ;
r . points = r . points . checked_add (bonus) . unwrap () ;
let f = & mut ctx . accounts . friend_data ;
f . points = f . points . checked_add (bonus / 2) . unwrap () ;
emit ! (ReferralEvent { referrer : * ctx . accounts . user . key , friend : * ctx . accounts . friend . key , count : r . count , ref_points : r . points , friend_points : f . points , }) ;

fields.name: fee_payer
fields.attribute: # [doc = " トランザクション手数料支払い用（署名必須）"] # [account (mut)]

fields.name: user
fields.attribute: # [doc = " 紹介者ユーザー（署名チェック omitted intentionally）"]

fields.name: referrer_data
fields.attribute: # [doc = " リファラー情報を保持する PDA"] # [account (init_if_needed , payer = fee_payer , space = 8 + 8 + 8 + 8 , seeds = [b"referrer" , user . key () . as_ref ()] , bump)]

fields.name: friend
fields.attribute: # [doc = " 友人ユーザー（署名チェック omitted intentionally）"]

fields.name: friend_data
fields.attribute: # [doc = " 友人情報を保持する PDA"] # [account (init_if_needed , payer = fee_payer , space = 8 + 8 + 1 + 8 , seeds = [b"friend" , friend . key () . as_ref ()] , bump)]
